data.enText: the belief that money, possessions and physical comforts are more important than spiritual values
the belief that only material things exist

tr: (philosophy) the philosophical theory that matter is the only reality
a desire for wealth and material possessions with little interest in ethical or spiritual matters

value.def: Materialism is the attitude of someone who attaches a lot of importance to money and wants to possess a lot of material things.

example.ex: ...the rising consumer materialism in society at large.
example.tran: 全社会范围内日渐蔓延的消费至上意识

example.ex: Leo is a materialist, living for life's little luxuries.
example.tran: 利奥是个物质享乐主义者，生活的乐趣就在一些小享受上。

value.def: Materialism is the belief that only physical matter exists, and that there is no spiritual world.

trans: 辩证唯物主义(马克思主义理论，认为所有变化都由相对立的社会力量引起，而对立源于物质需求产生的冲突)
